item.title: Specials
item.dc:creator: @Dell Dell
item.description:
@Dell wrote:

Ok currently im working on the whip special, i have the voids and everything so that its a full bar when you wear it, but one problem, now when i try to click on it it doesnt drain or attack with the spec…

this is what i have under case 185…

case 12331: if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4151) //whip { actionAmount++; sendMessage("You use the whip's special attack"); actionTimer = 15; stillgfx4(341, absY, absX); sendFrame230(0, 12329, 0, 0); //middle } else { sendFrame230(0, 12334, 0, 0); //end } break;

anyone have any idea on how to fix?

Read full topic
